mentionedBy.name: Veeva Systems Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Approximately 400 OCE customers including many mid-to-large companies. Exceptional flexibility and scalability with Next Best Action (NBA) capabilities strategically guiding sales teams. Much more affordable: $3,000 for full platform access vs Veeva's $10-15,000/year certification costs. Arguably slightly ahead in embedding predictive intelligence at scale. Appeals to small and mid-sized companies
